alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Chaves County Plains; Curry County; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 4:11AM MST until January 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Central Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Far Northeast Highlands, Curry County, Roosevelt County, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow possible along the east slopes of the Sangre de Cristo Mountains. Accumulating snow of up to 5 inches possible in the Moreno Valley including Angel Fire.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Chaves County Plains; Curry County; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
